732252f-a.title: Newspapers - China Daily News Series No. 23.
732252f-a.text:
Newspapers: China Daily News Series--No. 23
''Moi Hua,'' sturdy winter blooming tree adopted by the Chinese
people as representative of the spirit of New China. This picture
of ''Moi Hua,'' by a famous Chinesspainter, Chang Hsin, who now re-
sides in this country, can be seen in the business office of the
China Daily News.
1940
Alexander Alland
NNO REPRODUCTIONS
